snippet.title: Gravewood High — Development Progress Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist and play the demo now → https://bit.ly/GravewoodHighDPT

In this latest video for Gravewood High, we show off the reworked enemy AI and how he will stalk the player, along with improvements to level generation and the environments. You do not want to miss your creepiest school year yet.

Gravewood High is an infinitely replayable stealth horror game set in a spooky high school. The game is developed and published by HeroCraft PC, a Russian-based video game company. Gravewood High is set to release later this year on Epic Games Store and Steam.
